query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0135 SET LICNUM = #LICNUM# ,CONUM = #CONUM# ,LICDT = #LICDT# ,OPENDT = #OPENDT# ,SITE_REP = #SITE_REP# ,SITE_JUNO = #SITE_JUNO# ,CELLP = #CELLP# ,CERTNO = #CERTNO# ,ITEM = #ITEM# ,GRADE = #GRADE# ,CERTDT = #CERTDT# ,UPID = #G_USER_ID# ,UDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR#
